text: Nɨ gumazamizibar nguibam ategh, mangɨva asɨzir atiaba ko ikiam. Nɨ bulmakaubar mɨn dadabar amɨ, egh puram azenan dakuam. Eghtɨ dɨmagarimɨn ghuariar dɨpaba 7plan azenibar nɨ giram. Nɨ kamaghɨra ikɨ, mangɨ kamaghɨn fogham, Godɨn Bar Pɨn Itim bar gumazamizibagh atifa. Ezɨ a uabɨ uan ifongiamɨn, gumaziba mɨsevima me atrivibar otifi.
